flavorText: Lurking beneath the murky waters of Ixalan's rivers, sailbacks can rip a meal off the shore in the blink of an eye.

foreignData.flavorText: Alles, was sich an die trüben Wasser Ixalans heranwagt, muss damit rechnen, die nächste Mahlzeit eines Segelrückens zu werden.
foreignData.name: Schnappender Segelrücken
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen
Erzürnen — Immer wenn dem Schnappenden Segelrücken Schaden zugefügt wird, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf ihn. (Er muss den Schaden überleben, um die Marke zu erhalten.)

foreignData.flavorText: Los dorsovelas se ocultan bajo las aguas turbias de los ríos de Ixalan y pueden atrapar a cualquier presa que se acerque a beber en un abrir y cerrar los ojos.
foreignData.name: Dorsovela fulminante
foreignData.text:
Destello.

foreignData.flavorText: Rôdant sous les eaux troubles des rivières d'Ixalan, les voiléchines peuvent saisir leur repas sur la terre ferme en un clin d'œil.

foreignData.text:

Rage — À chaque fois que le Voiléchine happeur subit des blessures, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur lui. (Il doit survivre aux blessures pour gagner le marqueur.)

foreignData.flavorText: In agguato sotto la superficie torbida dei fiumi di Ixalan, i dorsocrestati possono afferrare il loro prossimo pasto dalla riva in un batter d'occhio.

foreignData.text:
Lampo
Infuriare — Ogniqualvolta viene inflitto danno al Dorsocrestato Azzannatore, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su di esso. (Deve sopravvivere al danno per ricevere il segnalino.)

foreignData.flavorText: 帆背びれは、イクサランの濁った川の水面下から、岸にいる獲物を瞬く間に捕らえる。

name: Snapping Sailback
originalText:
Flash
Enrage — Whenever Snapping Sailback is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counter.)

rulings.text: If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

text:
Flash
